original_text: Then you must tell them what I say: “It is because your ancestors turned against me. They went to other gods. They worshipped and they served those gods. They turned against me and they did not obey my law.
korean_text: 너는 그들에게 대답하기를 여호와께서 말씀하시되 너희 조상들이 나를 버리고 다른 신들을 따라서 그들을 섬기며 그들에게 절하고 나를 버려 내 율법을 지키지 아니하였음이라

sentences.original_text: Then you must tell them what I say:
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 너는 그들에게 내가 하는 말을 전해야 한다:

sentences.original_text: It is because your ancestors turned against me.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 너희 조상들이 나를 배반했기 때문이다.

sentences.original_text: They worshipped and they served those gods.
and they did not obey my law.
